backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and score submissions with access control and leaderboard sorting.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend audio, ads, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light and dark theme variables using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry that loads the React app via root div and main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing screen navigation, audio, authentication, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/audio/AudioManager.ts: Audio controller handling SFX playback and music settings using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/auth/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button component wired to Internet Identity and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Modal dialog allowing new users to submit a display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/auth/useProfileSetup.ts: Hook determining if the profile setup dialog should be shown based on authentication and profile state.
frontend/src/game/assetLoader.ts: Loads image assets asynchronously and returns them as a structured object.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Defines file paths for all game image assets.
frontend/src/game/collision.ts: Performs padded AABB collision detection between the player and obstacles.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Holds global constants for canvas size, physics, speeds, obstacle settings, scoring, and animation.
frontend/src/game/GameHUD.tsx: HUD component showing the current score and providing an on‑screen jump button.
frontend/src/game/GameRenderer.ts: Canvas renderer handling background parallax, ground tiling, player animations, and obstacle drawing.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: React component initializing assets, game loop, rendering, input handling, and HUD display.
frontend/src/game/obstacles.ts: Contains logic for obstacle spawn timing, obstacle creation, and updating obstacle positions.
frontend/src/game/physics.ts: Handles gravity updates and jump initiation for the player.
frontend/src/game/runnerLoop.ts: Main game loop updating physics, spawning obstacles, scoring, and detecting collisions.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for player, obstacles, game state, and game status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, state management, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, scores, and leaderboard data through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with an amber-focused palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/rewardedAds/useRewardedCont: Manages state for showing a rewarded ad and controlling whether the player can continue.
frontend/src/screens/GameOverScreen.tsx: Displays the game over UI, handles score submission, best score display, and offers restart, menu, and ad-based continue options.
frontend/src/screens/LeaderboardScreen.t: Shows the top scores leaderboard, highlights the current user, and displays the user's best score if logged in.
frontend/src/screens/MainMenuScreen.tsx: Renders the main menu with start, leaderboard, settings, and login/logout options using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/screens/RewardedAdModal.tsx: Simulates a rewarded ad with a countdown and progress bar before triggering continuation.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides toggles for music and sound effects, syncing settings with the audio manager and local storage.
frontend/src/settings/storage.ts: Handles loading and saving user settings to localStorage with default fallbacks.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: React hook that loads, updates, and persists user settings.
frontend/src/ui/ScreenLayout.tsx: Wraps screens with a gradient background and fixed footer including a caffeinated attribution link.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config extending colors, radius, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s versioned state and features for an Android endless runner game, including architecture notes, assets, and implemented requirements.
